groaned a bit,"},{"lineNumber":119034,"originalJapaneseLine":"観念するとランスに向き直り――","translatedEnglishLine":"but resigned herself and turned to Lance—"},{"lineNumber":119035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh?\""},{"lineNumber":119036,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぺこりと頭を下げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She bowed her head politely."},{"lineNumber":119037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お兄さん……ごめんなさい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-big brother... I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":119038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、よく出来ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, well never thought I'd hear those words"},{"lineNumber":119044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな言葉が聞けるなんてなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"come out of Shizuka's mouth!\""},{"lineNumber":119045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance-san.\""},{"lineNumber":119046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":119047,"originalJapaneseLine":"今度はジロリとした視線が","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, a sharp glare"},{"lineNumber":119048,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに向けられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"was directed at Lance."},{"lineNumber":119049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな小さな子が頭を下げて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is the meaning of laughing"},{"lineNumber":119050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを笑うとは何事ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"at such a small child bowing her head?\""},{"lineNumber":119051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うむ……そう、だな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um... yes, you're right..."},{"lineNumber":119052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すまん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":119053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私に謝るのではないでしょう？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You shouldn't be apologizing to me, right?"},{"lineNumber":119054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　志津香に言うことはないのですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't you have anything to say to Shizuka?\""},{"lineNumber":119055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、ぐ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, guh...\""},{"lineNumber":119056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すまん、かったな……志津香……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-sorry, that was bad... Shizuka...\""},{"lineNumber":119057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「志津香、こう言ってるけど、どう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shizuka, he's saying this, what do you think?\""},{"lineNumber":119058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、私は別に、まあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I don't particularly... well..."},{"lineNumber":119059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　い、いいけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fine though...\""},{"lineNumber":119060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うむ……そうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um... I see...\""},{"lineNumber":119061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、すごいですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, that's amazing."},{"lineNumber":119062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様と志津香さんがこんな素直に！","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance-sama and Shizuka-san being so honest!"},{"lineNumber":119063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、初めて見ちゃいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've never seen this before.\""},{"lineNumber":119064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch!"},{"lineNumber":119065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クスン、なんで叩くんですかぁ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sniff, why did you hit me?\""},{"lineNumber":119066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、やかましい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sh-shut up!\""},{"lineNumber":119067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":119068,"originalJapaneseLine":"（知らなかった……","translatedEnglishLine":"(I didn't know..."},{"lineNumber":119069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、こういう相手に案外弱いのかも……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I'm surprisingly weak against this kind of person...)"},{"lineNumber":119070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　どうしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What's wrong?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐさまパレロアは志津香と目線を合わせ、
真剣な表情で説教を始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started to scold her with a serious expression.
"'But' is not an excuse, is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、やーい、怒られてる」
あんた、も違うでしょう？」
あまりいい行為ではなかった、わね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That wasn't a very good thing to do, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謝ることが出来て偉いわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's great that you can apologize.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、私に謝るのではないでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you shouldn't be apologizing to me, right?"
"You need to properly say to Lance-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お兄さんごめんなさいって言わないと駄目よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Big brother, I’m sorry.’ You have to say that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、それ言わないと駄目なの！？」
志津香は少し唸ったが、
観念するとランスに向き直り――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but resigned herself and turned to Lance—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パレロアが優しく志津香の頭を撫でる。
まさか、志津香の口から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought I'd hear those words

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな言葉が聞けるなんてなー！」
今度はジロリとした視線が
「こんな小さな子が頭を下げて、
それを笑うとは何事ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at such a small child bowing her head?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私に謝るのではないでしょう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You shouldn't be apologizing to me, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香に言うことはないのですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you have anything to say to Shizuka?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「志津香、こう言ってるけど、どう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shizuka, he's saying this, what do you think?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と志津香さんがこんな素直に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance-sama and Shizuka-san being so honest!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、初めて見ちゃいました」
クスン、なんで叩くんですかぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sniff, why did you hit me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、こういう相手に案外弱いのかも……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I'm surprisingly weak against this kind of person...)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐさまパレロアは志津香と目線を合わせ、
真剣な表情で説教を始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started to scold her with a serious expression.
"'But' is not an excuse, is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、やーい、怒られてる」
あんた、も違うでしょう？」
あまりいい行為ではなかった、わね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That wasn't a very good thing to do, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謝ることが出来て偉いわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's great that you can apologize.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、私に謝るのではないでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you shouldn't be apologizing to me, right?"
"You need to properly say to Lance-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お兄さんごめんなさいって言わないと駄目よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Big brother, I’m sorry.’ You have to say that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、それ言わないと駄目なの！？」
志津香は少し唸ったが、
観念するとランスに向き直り――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but resigned herself and turned to Lance—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パレロアが優しく志津香の頭を撫でる。
まさか、志津香の口から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought I'd hear those words

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな言葉が聞けるなんてなー！」
今度はジロリとした視線が
「こんな小さな子が頭を下げて、
それを笑うとは何事ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at such a small child bowing her head?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私に謝るのではないでしょう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You shouldn't be apologizing to me, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香に言うことはないのですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you have anything to say to Shizuka?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「志津香、こう言ってるけど、どう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shizuka, he's saying this, what do you think?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と志津香さんがこんな素直に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance-sama and Shizuka-san being so honest!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、初めて見ちゃいました」
クスン、なんで叩くんですかぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sniff, why did you hit me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、こういう相手に案外弱いのかも……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I'm surprisingly weak against this kind of person...)
